trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The lovesick Nu Mou is struggling to make a decision.
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_TODO_01<tab>Report to the lovesick Nu Mou.
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_WORRYNUMOU03412_000_000<tab>Should I give them this...or should I give them that? Gah, I can't decide!

TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_WORRYNUMOU03412_000_001<tab>There's someone I fancy, and I want to give them a gift, but I don't know what manner of item is best... To get an idea, I thought about asking some of the others what they would like to receive, but I worry that they'll mistake my question as a proposition.
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_WORRYNUMOU03412_000_002<tab>If the question were to come from you, though, it wouldn't be a concern. Please, will you go and do the asking in my stead?
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_WORRYNUMOU03412_000_003<tab>Please, ask some of the others here what manner of gift they would like to receive. It will help me to decide what to give to my special someone.
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_OSESIGUN_000_010<tab>What I would be happy to receive? I suppose a grimoire wouldn't go astray. It never hurts to have more knowledge.
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_GYUFDAEN_000_011<tab>I'm afraid this is rather unimaginative, but I'm quite partial to flowers. We can't grow them in the cave, and they would help to brighten up the village.
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_IALAOUL_000_012<tab>My choice of a gift? Why, a porxie, for certain. There's nothing more useful than a trusty familiar, and the more adorable it is, the better.
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_OSESIGUN_000_013<tab>What I would be happy to receive? I suppose a grimoire wouldn't go astray. It never hurts to have more knowledge.
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_GYUFDAEN_000_014<tab>I'm afraid this is rather unimaginative, but I'm quite partial to flowers. We can't grow them in the cave, and they would help to brighten up the village.
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_IALAOUL_000_015<tab>My choice of a gift? Why, a porxie, for certain. There's nothing more useful than a trusty familiar, and the more adorable it is, the better.
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_WORRYNUMOU03412_000_020<tab>You've spoken with the others? Please tell me what you learned!
TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_WORRYNUMOU03412_000_021<tab>I see, I see... Yes, I believe I can finally decide! Thank you ever so much!

TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_WORRYNUMOU03412_000_022<tab>When I was little, a mortal told me that a gift isn't something one must give, but something one <var 1A 02 /var>wants<var 1A 01 /var> to give. For a long time, I didn't understand what his words meant. But that changed when I met...<var 1A 02 /var>them<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_LUCKZD005_03412_WORRYNUMOU03412_000_023<tab>Simply thinking of them makes me want to give them a gift. And thanks to you, I'm confident I can choose one that will bring a smile to their face. Please accept this as a fitting payment for your kind help.
